lead_paragraph: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri spent the first half of last season talking about reaching the 40-point threshold to avoid relegation before his side galloped away with the title.

headline.print_headline: Ranieri's 40-Point Mantra No Laughing Matter Now for Leicester
headline.main: Ranieri's 40-Point Mantra No Laughing Matter Now for Leicester
